hero.title:
FULLSTACK DEVELOPER
FOCUSED ON RESULTS.
hero.description: I create complete digital solutions that combine performance, organization, and product vision.

project1.title: Viva Cred Financial ERP
project1.description: I developed a complete ERP for financial operations at Viva Cred, including production control, JWT authentication, security logs, and banking integrations with Pan and Daycoval.

project2.title: Commercial Proposal Generator
project2.description: A personal system to automate commercial proposals with product registration, automatic tax calculation, and PDF generation. Built with TypeScript, Node.js, PostgreSQL and GitHub Actions CI/CD.

project3.title: Residential Energy Monitor
project3.description: Academic project in collaboration with UNISANTOS to visualize energy consumption in households. Uses Next.js for SSR, MongoDB for storage, and Tailwind for a responsive UI.

project4.title: Tourism Secretariat Dashboard
project4.description: Internal dashboard for viewing SÃ£o Paulo Tourism Secretariat data. Built with Vue.js, Express backend, and SQLite for local usage in restricted networks.

project5.title: Dev News Portal
project5.description: Personal portal with web development news and tutorials. Built with Angular, Firebase for auth/storage, and Bootstrap. Includes real-time commenting and favoriting.

project6.title: Sentiment Analysis Dashboard
project6.description: Dashboard built for a UNISANTOS research project focused on market news sentiment analysis. Backend in Django with PostgreSQL and frontend using Svelte.
